item.title: Google Says AI Agent Thwarted Exploitation of Critical Vulnerability
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Google refused to share any details on how its Big Sleep AI foiled efforts to exploit a SQLite vulnerability in the wild.

The post Google Says AI Agent Thwarted Exploitation of Critical Vulnerability  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: China’s Salt Typhoon Hacked US National Guard
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Chinese hacking group Salt Typhoon targeted a National Guard unit’s network and tapped into communications with other units.

The post China’s Salt Typhoon Hacked US National Guard appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Former US Soldier Who Hacked AT&T and Verizon Pleads Guilty
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Cameron John Wagenius pleaded guilty to charges related to hacking into US telecommunications companies.

The post Former US Soldier Who Hacked AT&T and Verizon Pleads Guilty appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: IoT Security Firm Exein Raises $81 Million
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Italian company Exein has raised €70 million (~$81 million) in a Series C funding round led by Balderton.

The post IoT Security Firm Exein Raises $81 Million  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Chrome Update Patches Fifth Zero-Day of 2025
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Google has released a Chrome 138 security update that patches a zero-day, the fifth resolved in the browser this year.

The post Chrome Update Patches Fifth Zero-Day of 2025 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Virtual Event Preview: Cloud & Data Security Summit – Tackling Exposed Attack Surfaces in the Cloud
item.dc:creator: SecurityWeek News
item.description:
Virtual event brings together leading experts, practitioners, and innovators for a full day of insightful discussions and tactical guidance on evolving threats and real-world defense strategies in cloud security.

The post Virtual Event Preview: Cloud & Data Security Summit – Tackling Exposed Attack Surfaces in the Cloud appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Threat Actors Use SVG Smuggling for Browser-Native Redirection
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Obfuscated JavaScript code is embedded within SVG files for browser-native redirection to malicious pages.

The post Threat Actors Use SVG Smuggling for Browser-Native Redirection appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: DDoS Attacks Blocked by Cloudflare in 2025 Already Surpass 2024 Total
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Cloudflare has published its quarterly DDoS threat report for Q2 2025 and the company says it has blocked millions of attacks.

The post DDoS Attacks Blocked by Cloudflare in 2025 Already Surpass 2024 Total  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Data Breach at Debt Settlement Firm Impacts 160,000 People
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Pennsylvania-based Century Support Services is disclosing a data breach after its systems were hacked in November 2024. 

The post Data Breach at Debt Settlement Firm Impacts 160,000 People appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Zip Security Raises $13.5 Million in Series A Funding
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Zip Security’s Series A funding round led by Ballistic Ventures will help the company grow its engineering and go-to-market teams.

The post Zip Security Raises $13.5 Million in Series A Funding appeared first on SecurityWeek.
